name: Bean Tahini Dip
keywords: beans, pita, tahini, high fiber, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cooked beans with 2 cooked carrots (see recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Turn food processor on and put garlic through feed tube; process to mince. Add onion through feed tube and mince.
Open processor and add beans with carrots, tahini, lemon juice and red pepper. Process to a paste. Season to taste with salt.
Serve with toasted triangles of pita.
